Solhint

avoid-low-level-calls

The {‚Äúextends‚Äù: ‚Äúsolhint:recommended‚Äù} property in a configuration file enables this rule.

Description

Avoid to use low level calls.

Options

This rule accepts a string option of rule severity. Must be one of ‚Äúerror‚Äù, ‚Äúwarn‚Äù, ‚Äúoff‚Äù. Default to warn.

Example Config

{
  "rules": {
    "avoid-low-level-calls": "warn"
  }
}

Examples

üëé Examples of incorrect code for this rule

Using low level calls

msg.sender.call(code);
a.callcode(test1);
a.delegatecall(test1);

Version

This rule is introduced in the latest version.
